website_summaries.verdict: Despite occasional durability issues right out of the box, most buyers find this to be a super-strong and very large tube.
pros: Can inflate it with a hairdryer
cons: Some buyers report that it rips or pops easily, while other say it loses air fast

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I got this delivered for free with 2 day prime delivery 4 hours before the snow started. I was worried about how to blow it up. Well, stop worrying. Just breath in deeply and breathe out strongly into the tube. It only took about 10 minutes to fill. And the thing is amazing... Just find the nearest hill, hang on to the handles, and let it go... I got the big one and my 8 year old son fit in perfectly, was able to hang on to the handle bars, and went further than I ever did in my life! This was the best time I have had in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: NWNJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fast, and mega fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: The material on this product is great! It has a thick layer on the bottom and the side, much stronger than other tubes we've had. As a mom of five, this was used all day long, and I didn't have any problems with keeping it aired up. It was a smooth ride, with no problem on comfort, and it was crazy fast. The kids had a blast and we are definitely going to be purchasing more for when extended family comes to visit. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No complaint with the tube.. we took it for a week of Northern California tubing .. my kids even took it down an icy drive way😳.. I was sure it would have busted! Nope!!! It was in tack
customer_reviews.author: Haley Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: I can not wait to give this to my son for Christmas. We try to do a mixture of useful, and fun gifts This definitely is a fun one! I strongly suggest having a pump of some sort, because while you can inflate it the good old fashioned way, it takes a bit of breath. This is a 4 foot tube! I love that it included a nice carry bag, so it can be deflated, and packed away easily in the off season, or between uses. It also included a pair of patches, because things happen when you are sledding. It's a great size, and looks awesome. I know he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: willisotaTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: SLOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning immediately. Kids had perfect sledding conditions with hard-packed snow and 30 degrees. All the kids on tubes were flying down the hill but my kids barely made it to the bottom with this tube. It was laughably slow and my kids were embarrassed to use it. Too bad because it blew up easily and has a durable bottom. Make that a very slow durable bottom.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work very well, Avoid this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This snow tube is very poorly designed. It doesn’t glide over snow but sticks to snow. The bottom isn’t made of a slick surface, so it sticks to snow, instead of gliding over. Handles are very small, so you can’t even get a glove inside them, so handles are useless. Avoid this tube! You’ll be disappointed, I sent back the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Hold On Tight....
customer_reviews.text: Hold on tight with this snow tube...It’s definitely a must have... This tube is 47 inches (total measurement of the tube)of perfect butt room...(a little to big for the smaller kiddos)...it has handles that are easy to hold onto...very easy to blow up...even comes with patches if you get a hole... All you need is snow and a hill...be prepared they have lots of fun.....I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest product review.
customer_reviews.author: CARA DOUGLAS

customer_reviews.title: Got our snow tube and it's perfect. The material looks like it will last for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got our snow tube and it's perfect. The material looks like it will last for a while. They girls will enjoy some snow days with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer Munoz

customer_reviews.title: came defective
customer_reviews.text: not sure if has a whole but we order this on january 15th. we live in the DC area. WE finally had another snow day and decided to use this. Inflated beautifully only not to be full by the time we walked to our hill. It's been a little over a month and I cannot return. I am disappointed since it costed 35 bucks. We have others from target than cost much less that lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: cristiane

customer_reviews.title: textured bottom takes all the speed out...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to use snow tubing, and one other cheaper one. We sent both these ones back because they were literally SO SLOW.l. They took all the fun out of our snow tubing trip. The ONLY good thing it would be for is if you had a very small child on a very steep hill. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bJones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this had some kind of leak straight out of the box. There was no obvious hole we could find and it was a slow leak, so we didn't realize it when we tested in upon delivery. But once we got to the snow it would only stay inflated for 5-10 minutes. We returned it, but the kids were still disappointed not to use it on our sledding trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: This tube goes real slow, we used on fresh snow and on ice hills it ran slower than walmarts cheap one. Did'nt matter what size person we put on it has some real drag going on.
customer_reviews.author: grannykuhl

customer_reviews.title: One use, now useless
customer_reviews.text: We used this one day last year. My son is the only person who uses it and he is now 7 years old. We finally got a good amount of snow this year, filled it up, and it doesn't hold air. I looked at a lot of choices and this had pretty solid reviews. Way bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Shon P.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids for xmas and it did not snow till 1-20-19 and the first run down the hill my sons got a 3 inch tear in the bottom. then on my daughters 2nd run down the hill hers got a 4 inch tear in the bottom. Absolute junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick quality plastic, easy to inflate and quick to deflate
customer_reviews.text: This tube is good size and it is thick plastic and easy to inflate and deflate, it has 2 places to inflate and deflate in 1 hole so the air will not be releases when trying to close the lid, I love that feature. I bought 3 of these tubes because of the great quality. When you go to deflate it has a big opening and deflates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: connie andrew

customer_reviews.title: 500 lb max?! Challenge accepted.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 1/3/20-all reviews mentioning tube coming with hole in it, both of mine had this too and it doesn’t seem to extend inward to inner tube; neither of mine were affected by this-still inflate and perform fine. Prior review:What sold me was the 500lb max capacity!! And all the great reviews with videos and pics. Super slick bottom on this thing. My husband #210 and me #135 climbed on together and sailed down our hill laughing! Great handle placement and sturdy material from what we can tell so far. Ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: gustafeaux

customer_reviews.title: Came with a huge hole
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, one was ok, and the another one ... huge hole at the sit place. I didn't check both when they arrived (it was past winter time), so I was not ready to get back to winter, and checked just one. Now we have snow, and took snow tube for sledding. And then discovered this hole. No duct tape can fix it. What a disappointment. Please do not repeat my mistake. Check the snow tube when you receive it, so that you have that window for return.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Handles are very small
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself was a good size for my 5 year old to use by himself. We were actually able to ride it together, but it was a VERY tight squeeze. I am only 5' 6" and 165 pounds, so that's probably why. The handles however are very small. I could not get my hands through them with gloves on, but my son could. It also comes with a drawstring backpack for storage. We only used it for about 10 rides, so there were no durability issues.
customer_reviews.author: OCD

customer_reviews.title: It works better than the previous snow tube we had
customer_reviews.text: It works better than the previous snow tube we had, which had too much friction and slowed down quickly. This held up with people jumping on it to get a head start, including adults. Speaking of which, it's nice that it holds up to 500 pounds! Nice for even larger adults not to have to worry about damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anne

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to understand the reviews on these tubes. They didn't work for us AT ALL. Like we were trying to push ourselves down the hill with our hands while everyone else flew by. Unless it's an icy hill, these are not good and don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my kids to use on the neighborhood hill. Both tubes had leaks within the second day of using them. Patches did not hold at all. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go for winter # 2
customer_reviews.text: We gave this snow tube to our 12 year old grandson for Christmas last year. It lasted for the winter and he's looking forward to more use this winter! It is a sturdy sled and manageable for this age.
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Family fun with snow tubes
customer_reviews.text: These are such great snow tubes. We had bought a couple of another brand at a local hardware store and they popped the first time out on smooth snow. We bought these before a family sledding party and we used them non-stop for that day and many more. They keep the air without leaking, they are strong and durable, and they hold up adults for a great sledding experience. I highly recommend these snow tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Active VT Woman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Inflates Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this snow tube on my wish list since the last time we went sledding with plastic sleds. This year I finally decided to order and I’m so glad I did. Taking it out of the box I first noticed how rocky and heavy the material is. This is not an inflatable for the beach, this is heavy duty! Next I get my electric air pump and figured it would take forever to inflate but it was so fast! It literally took a few seconds to inflate! The kids will definitely be fighting over who’s turn it is to use this tube when we go sledding!
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon1977

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank but slow as a tank.
customer_reviews.text: Very well build and hardy. I particularly like the fill port as it accepts a typical air mattress pump nozzle and inflated quickly. It was also easy to deflate as the fill port opens up completely. The down side was how slow it was going down the hill, especially compared to my $20 snow tube. The re-enforced lower side is shrouded with a rubber-mesh material, and is not very slick. I would like to try some car wax on it next time but may be a while as I live in the desert and won’t be back in the snow for a while. And that’s why it only gets 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but slow
customer_reviews.text: It's super sturdy and will take a lot of abuse. My main issue is that it's not fast. There is a slight texture on the bottom that I think might slow it down. It was a win on being able to handle my kids abusing it, but it's just not doing it for me when going down the hill. I'm considering putting wax or a spray on to help, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Very rugged snow tube
customer_reviews.text: Very thick mil material and the carrying case for storage is great. If you're tired if having to go out and get new snow tubes or sleds at the store every winter buy one of these. Bought two of these for my boys. It's been Two years so far and we deflate them after winter and store them in the bag and they're still as durable as the day we got them and even their mom and I use them. These are definitely more rugged than the snow tubes you'll find at Walmart or any other store.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad to write a negative review for these because I was so excited to get them! They look like they should be great. BUT... We followed all the directions about inflating the tubes, and sadly they don't stay inflated. When they aren't fully inflated, they don't work. (They immediately lose some air, and by the next morning are half empty. I don't see any obvious holes or damage.) We've tried to use the tubes three times now, and I think it's time to give up.
customer_reviews.author: ABandC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Buy a better quality tube!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. No idea how it has such good reviews. We made the mistake of buying it online since the reviews were so good but then we waited about 2 1/2 months to try them. no we are long past the return period. We went to a commercial tubing hill and this tube would not even go down the hill. It got stuck repeatedly. The commercial tubes worked great on the same hill. They do not inflate symmetrically and there’s a lot of friction on the bottom. Just not worthwhile. Spend your money on a better quality tube!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Erin Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: We had an epic winter this year, so we went sledding a ton. This tube never disappointed. It is very durable - at one point we had 5 kids on it and it never popped or lost air. It also sometimes was subjected to rocks and tree branches and has yet to spring a leak. I am very pleased that it made it through the entire season and I expect that it will last for several more years. Additionally I really like that the handles are easy to grip and are sturdy. The size (large) is also very nice, and the coloring/design is nice - it makes it easy to identify which tube is mine and not lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jollyroger

customer_reviews.title: This thing totally worked even for the adults!
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a sledding trip with a serious sledding hill. Everyone loved it! It even handled double riders (parent and child), although watch out the speed will make you dizzy. I will definitely be adding this to our snow trip must-haves.
customer_reviews.author: s roy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very large snow tube
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the A-Dudu snow tube that I bought. It was easy to inflate, very large size and easily can fit two young children (age 7-12). It is also very pretty and attractive against the white snow. It felts very durable and thick which is what you want from a snow tube. Unfortunately mine arrived with two tiny holes almost can't see or notice when you fill the tube with air because the holes were so small. I think it was damaged during the shipping from a staples or something similar in size. I ended up returning it to Amazon but I definitely plan to purchase this product again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable compared to most of the snow tubes I've used also a little bit larger. I like that I can use a Shop-Vac to inflate it. It held up all last season and we plan on using them this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gottadownsize

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Snow Tube!
customer_reviews.text: After sledding down hills with sleds and tobaggons for years, and after researching something that would last and go faster, I purchased two of these for our sledding hill. The kids were coming home for Christmas and we had lots of snow so I wanted them to have a special experience. Wow! These snow tubes by A-Dudu were amazing! They were easy to inflate, especially using a electric air compressor, lightweight, but sturdy enough to hold either 180lb men or 100lb women comfortably. They were so fast it and it was so much fun! I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: G. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Blowing up took awhile. Little black nozzle on it allowed blowing up with air leaking back out. Sturdy once fully inflated. Even after used for two.hours, didn't lose air pressure. Not big enuff for two adults at a time confortably, but kid and parent probably. Only complaint is was it wasn't very fast on the snow and ours had a little hole in the bottom-which didn't affect anything, but when unboxing and you find a defect-not cool.
customer_reviews.author: raz spazz

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily difficult to inflate
customer_reviews.text: The suggestion that this tube can be inflated with a hair dryer in under a minute is 100% false. All other tubes I've purchased are easily inflated with an air compressor. Attempting to use a hair dryer (on cool setting) ended with the inflation plug melting off and my smoke alarm activated. This despite multiple breaks suspecting this was a flawed process, and trying to allow the plastic to cool. I will be returning this product, frustrated and disappointed on a snowy day when my kids will not be sledding.....
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: The price is reasonable and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I will give this product a 5 start. We used this few time at Tahoe and meet what we expected for kid and family. So we buy a new one and want to interduce this product, if someone looks for snow tube. The product also came with small bag. So we don't need to buy another bag. The price is reasonable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a rugged tube that can hold two people! Very fast.
customer_reviews.author: sreid

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking air after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, but started leaking air after only a few uses. The valves are also very difficult to open and close. The material that it is made of becomes very stiff in the cold so it's difficult to fill and get sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Booker

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and Loads of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the kids and I ended up using it more than they did! Very rugged construction, very good size (much larger and thicker than what was on offer at the big box stores). I would recommend this product to anyone. These held up all winter and we had a lot of fun in the backyard. No visible damage from use and no visible fading from UV degradation either. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: J Benton

customer_reviews.title: These things were like riding on Velcro!!
customer_reviews.text: High expectations based on reviews and boy were we disappounted. We were in a hard, snowpacked steep hill and everyone was making it down at varying speeds. We attempted 4 runs and these things couldn't even make it down half way before they would just stop. A dude in a laundry basket blew buy us to give you some idea how bad these things were. This was in the mountains in Colorado so don't blame the conditions. Returned and hope to give a real world view of their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Petrak

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but not for pulling behind!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these last year and they are the best! I do deflate them when not in use- so that may help them last longer. But CAUTION: they are NOT to be pulled behind anything, just strictly sledding down hills. Some family members attached it to a 4 wheeler and pulled it around, well let’s just say I don’t have that one anymore. But they are so good that I am ordering the exact thing to replace it! I would highly recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and perfect for all members of the family!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that when sitt8ng in the garage between uses the tube deflates slowly on it own. It takes less than overnight for it to deflate down halfway. Works great for sledding and has been perfect for the whole family. From my 2yr old to the older kids and even my husband and me. I also like that it is easy and comfortable to fit an adult and younger child together at the same time. Heavy duty material and comes with patch kit if needed (we haven’t had a hole yet though).
customer_reviews.author: MommaH

customer_reviews.title: A-DuDu? No, it isn't crap. It's actually flippin' amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tube a dozen times so far. Only had one puncture when my teenage son got a little crazy with some trees. The patches that come with the tube are a little ridiculous. They were no better than cheap packing tape. I bought a Slime tire repair kit and that patch has held up really well. This is the best tube we own. We have lovingly named it Mr Crapper, or Senor Poops if we're feeling spicy. Hey when your company is called A-DuDu, what do you expect? I have recommended it to friends and every time we go out someone asks about where we got "Mr Crapper." Keep it up. Solid tube.
customer_reviews.author: the blue east

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have to amend my original review in which I stated that the two tubes I ordered arrived with holes in the bottoms. They did indeed arrive with a small hole in the bottom of each tube. BUT, I am a moron because it would appear that is part of the design. I only wish that I had known that prior to exchanging them. The snow tubes work great and the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni B.

customer_reviews.title: Gonna be good times on a snow covered hill
customer_reviews.text: Reinforced bottom with extra layer of material. Good durable hand grips. Only complaint is the inflation port is a little oversized. A bicycle pump/compressor nozzle wont fit snugly. Took quite a few lungfulls to get it inflated, but it seals incredible well and was well worth the cost. I will update the review after it snows and I get to use it
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Make winter so much fun again!
customer_reviews.text: A-DUDU snow tube out performed any snow tube or sled we’ve ever had before. Everyone on the snow hills this winter wanted to get in my kids A-DUDU! This is not just for kids though.. mine are teens and we did it to. This thing flies down snow and what a blast! Get rid of all your other sleds and snow tubes and get this. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: BOSTON READER

customer_reviews.title: Best Snow Tube On The Market
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty snow tube stands up to New England Winters and summers. I purchase my 11 year old son the A-Dudu 47 inch snow tube for Christmas 2017. Not only did it stand up to 2 winters in New England it also provided plenty of ocean and pool fun in the summer. This tube absolutely stands up to the test of time. If you are looking for a great snow tube then this is the tube for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: BrendaK

customer_reviews.title: Great option for adults
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of review for other sleds on Amazon that were breaking when used by adults, I stumbled upon this. This is a super convenient, functional, and fun snow tube. The tube is great when compared to traditional sleds because it is so light and easy to carry back up a hill without weighing you down. It holds air quite well and allows you to gain some good speed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Savant

customer_reviews.title: Not as fast as I expected. Good price though.
customer_reviews.text: On wiki vid, this was rated one of the best. But it actually doesn't move that fast for what I thought it would. Others out perform this. This would be okay for children under six though
customer_reviews.author: saintzk

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Snow Tubing!
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are built for snow! With two handles, an elevated bottom for your rear end, and a sleek underside, you'll fly down the hill, even with very little snow. My kids still flew down the hill on less than an inch of snow! They are also sturdy enough for most adults. I don't know the weight limit, but we had 270 lbs on one and had zero issues! They handle most unevenness that a normal sled/tube run should have but will puncture if you run into heavy thorns or barbed wire. Even so, A-DUDU provides a patch kit with each tube. This is a great buy, and would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: SaraW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big adults - lasts multiple seasons - ultra fast!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 250 pound guy and wanted my own tube to go tubing/sledding on the hill with my son and this tube is great. It's big and fast. I went farther than anyone ("I've never seen anyone make it into the tree line" as one guy said) due to the slick surface. And best of all, it's lasted in to its second season after simply being kept deflated in the garage during spring/summer/fall.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tube!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! Gave to my grandkids for Christmas I blew it up before giving so they didn’t just open a box with blue plastic in it - they are 2 and 4 so the tube sat around for a while and they sat and bounced in it in the house before we got snow and they were able to use outside! Very durable made it through the season and now they use it in the pool!! Great product and I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Price

customer_reviews.title: This does not work in snow- NO speed slow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible. It would not slide in packed snow or powder. I could not get it to slide downhill. It just stuck to the snow and would not pick up speed and we tried it on a giant sled hill with a huge decline grade. This is not worth any money and will not be fun for you and your family.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie comito

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like how thick the material is. It seems extremely sturdy for my son to use. I like how it's bigger as well. Definitely is better quality than ones I have previously purchased. Looking for to having fun with my son in the snow with this!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth yon

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace a much more expensive sled that just didn't perform well at all. Our friends had purchased this for their son the previous winter and after trying it out for ourselves we had to purchase two for our children. Very durable sleds. Obvious quality craftsmanship unlike many other inflatable sleds you'll find. Easy to deflate for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: SLOWWWWWW
customer_reviews.text: The tube is slow! Extremely slow. We had good snow conditions with an icy packed trail. The foam sleds flew down the hill and this tube barely made it to the bottom with me giving my kid a big push. My 5 year old got off the tube and looked at me in disgust, after me talking up this cool tube sled that was coming in the mail. The tube is tough, but worthless. It's probably not tough enough to pull behind a snowmobile, and it's too slow on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Guy 1

customer_reviews.title: Replacement tube
customer_reviews.text: We used this tube only once. When a kid with his 90lbs set on it for the first time, the material popped open and all the air went out. We contacted the seller and received a replacement tube with a nice email. We hope to enjoy the second tube loner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Heise

customer_reviews.title: My mistake, well made snow tube
customer_reviews.text: The tube appeared to have a whole in the bottom, so I returned it. I bought another one and found the some size hole in the bottom, I inflated it and realized it was my mistake, that the hole was on the bottom surface under the area that inflates. I wish the company would have told me this when I asked about the hole, it would have saved me the trouble of returning it and buying another. We have not used the tube yet due to lack of snow, but I am impressed with the quality and look forward to using it soon. It seems very well made and durable.”
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Flies down the snow
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this tube but it is worth the price. Its very fast so may want to wear safety gear during use. I forgot a pump on a trip up to the mountains. Not a problem. You can blow this thing up yourself. I'm not in great shape and was not turning blue or getting light headed. The tube slides across the snow really well. The material is thick yet pliable enough to fold for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for grownups!
customer_reviews.text: the A-DUDU Snow Tube is a very sturdy sledding tube. It is large enough for my husband (6ft 200lbs) . We've only had it one season but it appears very durable I expect to use it for years. The only con is it seems to loose air overnite, not a lot but noticeable. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Wynn

customer_reviews.title: This thing flies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so that me and my son could go tubing together. As soon as I got them filled up, my son took one and asked if his buddy could borrow the other. They both took off like bats out of hell! They loved them and when I got the chance to slide, it was a blast. Probably the best tube I have purchased in the last 5 years. These are easy to inflate, deflate and store back in their backpacks. Way cool and will definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good tube!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most awesome snow tube!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these tubes for a few years and absolutely LOVE them! They inflate quickly with a compressor, hold the air well, the air plugs stay in tight, and they are very comfortable to ride. The handles and tube material are all sturdy and well-made. They go super fast and give us a screamy-dreamy ride! We have never had a problem with leaks, tears or punctures. These tubes are a very inexpensive way to enjoy some winter fun!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun with it, A+
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I ordered it because it have an excellent quality! It's very big and have strong hangs! Perfect for my children and my husband and I, we have a lot of fun time with it! It includes with a storage bag and two patches
customer_reviews.author: Labevy

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 runs
customer_reviews.text: After 5 minutes of use, one of the handles tore off and ripped a hole in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Mary McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Slow tube for snow
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made of quality material but the tube ended up being slow on the snow. We used it at a location where several other people had a variety of tubes, all of which allowed the person riding them to go much faster than this tube. Even cheap tractor tire inner tubes ended up being faster. For a fairly expensive tube specifically designed for snow use it didn’t provide the speed/fun that we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer needs to spend money on a label and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this isn't a knock off as it came in a box with no label or instructions. As I bought 4 for my grandkids, I made my own label from the info on Amazon so they would know what it looks like, as well as for their parents to know the info about the product. They haven't tried to inflate or use yet so not sure about those qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Third daughter

customer_reviews.title: Strong tubes
customer_reviews.text: Our winter was a bit mild but we got our two A-DUDU tubes out a few times and had a blast! They are very sturdy, give a great ride down hills, and held up better than any tubes we had before. I recommend them! And yes, they are easy to inflate with a reversible shop vac even if you just put the hose close to the open valve and get it most of the way inflated. You can do the rest yourself, although I had no problem inflating mine completely with my shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tube
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. We tried it couple of weeks on a snow mountain nearby and it works well. Easy to carry. The only optional thing missing is a pulling latch/rope. May be carry an extra latch with you in case you want to pull the snow tube over snow instead of carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: mnrj

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durability for the snow!
customer_reviews.text: Great tube for the snow. Way better than others I purchased from Target. Lasted several trips down the snow hills this past winter. Ready to use again for upcoming winter. Love the store away pouch it comes with. Will be purchasing another one so I don't have to share.
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: Thick vinyl. Fast and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value. This snow tube is super fast, has a thick bottom vinyl for durability, and is a great size for one adult or an adult and a small child. We were concerned by reviews that the product was not durable, but on our first snow run (about 20 downhill runs) with a 185lb and a 45lb child there were no issues. We ran over small branches, hit small tress sticking out of the ground and hit the side of a small broken baby tree, all without any damage to the tube. I hope it holds up for a long time, as it seems that it will.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great, Tough Tube!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a sled for Christmas but I'm so glad I opted for this tube instead. This snow tube provided hours of fun for my 3 and 5 year old as well as their 7 year old cousin in the snow on our annual trip to the mountains. Not only was it durable outside but withstood rough and tumble play with 3 boys. It also made a comfy reading seat for oldest son when we returned home. I would definitely recommend this durable snow tube!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tube that held it's air all season. My daughter used it in the winter in the snow and the summer in the creek. I usually have to replace it once a yeast but this is built alot beget than the usual tubes I used to buy. Very happy with this purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Eric the Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: We actually we're able to blow up by mouth.lol. 4 kids ages 4 2 6 year olds and a 8 year old have been abusing them riding down our back hill. So far so good we have 2 of them. It fits 2 at a time. Great kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: This is our first snow tube and I am so glad we got it. When there isn’t quite enough snow for sleds, this thing glides and our children love it. They actually prefer it over the sleds when we do have plenty of snow. Very easy to inflate/deflate. I would recommend and would purchase again, though since it came with patches I think we are good for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tube—very fast!
customer_reviews.text: We got these tubes to go sledding with our 4 year old in some Wisconsin snow. They are awesome! They were a little pricier than we wanted, but my husband was tired of the plastic sleds from local stores that didn’t perform. We’re glad we spent the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Brill

customer_reviews.title: Fun Winter Day
customer_reviews.text: Kids were super excited to try out their new snow tube from Santa! It did not disappoint. Had a great time snow tubing down the park hill. Sturdy enough for me to ride with my 2 year old. Small enough for my 6 year old to do it on his own. A great way to get the kids out of the house during our long NY winters!
customer_reviews.author: BL Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all...... ...
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all.......... Went tubing down a regular snow hill without any ice or bumps and it still went flat. Cheap POS....
customer_reviews.author: Greg Steed

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item toward the end of winter and I wish we'd ordered it earlier. It is sturdy, easy to inflate and deflate (so great for storing), and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: MammaJamma

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Hole
customer_reviews.text: Tube arrived with sizable hole along inflation valve seam. The type and location of the none sealed seam didn't allow for a fix using the patches that were provided with tube. 30 day return period had passed and product is unusable. These have never been built to last forever, but had hoped that my kids could have used it a few times before fixes were necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Nolte

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had a blast with this tube last winter! The kids and adults all loved it. It was by far the fastest ride down our “black diamond” backyard hill :) There are some rocks and prickle bushes near the bottom that definitely got run into, but didn’t harm the tube. The kids (6 and 7 years old) were able to carry it back up the hill about as easily as the other sleds. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ally

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Took them to a snow play area for a day. Big adults, kids, people of all sizes rode them all day. The bottom of these are double reinforced rubber which is really good. They don't travel super fast in the snow which in my opinion makes them safe.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tube
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this snow tube. We bought two kinds and the other we returned. This one slides really nicely on the snow and isn't too big or too small. We would definitely buy another later one when our little ones get older and we would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not fast
customer_reviews.text: Tube looks to be good quality but the bottom plastic is textured and is not as slick/fast as the $20 one I bought at Target.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Best snow tube out there!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tube I will definitely purchase again perfect for adults and kiddos! As you see sliding down was fun and you feel safe with the handles they are so sturdy!!! Not just that but for a sleeping 2 year it does the job lol, we used a strap to pull her around and I was afraid it was going to rip but nope, it’s really well made good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow (and other fun rides)
customer_reviews.text: We have used this in snow for two winters and it has held up great! We also used it recently on a "slip and slide" we made - 45 foot long plastic sheet going down a hill in our yard with lots of water - and it also did great. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great tube great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tube especially for the price. We got this for our kids last Christmas and they used it nearly daily for two months. We’ve already gotten it out this year too. Super easy to blow up. It’s TOUGH too. My son has ridden into some trees / sticks several times and no issues. I’ve taken it down some hills (200+ lbs) with my son on my back and it’s more than durable enough for us. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fun & good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this snow tube for 2 seasons now and it still looks brand new. Perfect size for big kids and teens to fit, not just little ones, but light enough for anyone to carry up a hill. Goes really fast, works best on snow that has already been packed down, like most sleds.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Speedy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these for our 7,8 and 3 year old kids, and we were not disappointed at all. They had the time of their lives in the snow, and we made so many videos and photos and we couldn’t be happier. Tube is light to carry and very easy to inflate and deflate. Very durable and excited to use again this year.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my husband to slide down our hill with my kids. All other inflatable snow tubes he was over the maximum weight with them so we chose this due to its durability and weight maximum. You can easily tell a difference between this dense material and cheaper tubes. It was easy to inflate and held up to my husband plus our three kids sledding on it. Very early and quickly deflates also. Because it’s so durable it’s a little slower than the others but with small kids that can actually a positive. Highly recommend and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: William Hottle

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and study, not slick enough on bottom though
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome tube honestly. The only downfall is the bottom is a bit rough, so it really doesn’t slide all that easy. This winter I’ll probably spray something on the bottom to make it more slick. Very thick and sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: bria murphy

customer_reviews.title: It's name perfectly... truly is a piece A DUDU
customer_reviews.text: Came with a hole somewhere. Would not hold air. Doesnt fill all the way. Hard to plug back up...Not fast and because it would not hold air it wouldn't slide. Hopefully we can return it. I suggest buying something that does not require air like a plastic sled.
customer_reviews.author: Lmboyd86

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: We had only 2 good snowfalls during the winter of 2019. My girls and their cousins had a blast on this snow tube. They loved how fast it went on the snow and how easy it was to carry back up the hill. I see more purchases in the future from family members. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: lifesajourney

customer_reviews.title: Fun on snowy hills.
customer_reviews.text: This is a big tube that easily accommodates adults for a lot of fun in the snow. You can tow it or ride it down a hill with sturdy handles. It is super relaxing just to lay on it. It is designed to be puncture resistant and to glide with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Fastest snow tube on the hill
customer_reviews.text: We bought this snow tube after watching with envy as our friends flew the fastest and furthest down the hill at our local elementary school on a snow day. We already had an industrial strength tube/cover that was similar to those used at snow tubing venues. That one still performs well but it's best suited for those really slick, ice-covered hills you find at the snow tubing venues. The A-DUDU tube works better on the hills you'll find in your backyard.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN SCHAEFFER

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Used it today for the first time. It was leaking, and then had a hole after just one use. Not durable at all. The one we had before this lasted for 5 years. Want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Dough

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what type of sled like thing to purchase for me and my four year old this winter, him finally at the age where he could participate in that kind of activity. I didn't want to get something that was super fast, but wanted something durable and easy to store the rest of the year. I decided on the Snow Tube and I'm very happy I did. It was a great introduction to sledding for him and quite frankly, on a steep enough incline this thing go's plenty fast! BTW, it's super durable as well. This year we we found hills around the neighborhood but next year I think we'll take the tube up to the mountain :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: strong and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We used it couple times this winter and spring and think it is awesome for kids and for adult also. It more convenient, than hard plastic sledge. We were concerned how does it strong on ice, but after couple use, we found out, that it is made from really good material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO much fun and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Yeah me! I was quite the hero when I surprised kids and grand kids with this during our ski/sledding trip. SO much fun and great quality. I did buy an electric pump to bring along though. Held up really well with kids jumping and crashing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Anne Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These inner tubes were complete crap!! they took forever to inflate, they didn’t hold air while sledding, and the return window is extremely short probably because the manufacturer knows what complete crap these are. do not buy these!!!! it’s a waste of money it’s a waste of time to inflate them and you won’t even be able to sled with them
customer_reviews.author: Elise Rutherford

product_meta.title: A-DUDU Snow Tube - Super Big 47 Inch Inflatable Snow Sled for Kids and Adults - Heavy Duty Inflatable Snow Tube Made by Thickening Material of 0.6mm
feature_bullets: ★★Upgrade Durable Two-Layer Bottom★★: Design with double layer bottom, it is more durable than most snow tube. [Attention!!!]: There is a small hole in the outer bottom material, it is not a defect, it is designed to discharge the air between the two layers when inflating and deflating, as we have added a layer of foundation on the basis of the original, so there is a gap between the two layers. The hole will not affect the use of the snow tube. The double base makes it more durable and faster!

★★Super High Quality Material★★: The snow tube is made of environmental friendly material. K80 PVC+PVC coating laminated fabric, our snow tube can be resistant to extreme cold temperature, up to minus 40 degrees, special coating makes you slide faster, perfect for sledding down snowy hills in Winter! With advanced seamless bonding technique, it is well leakproof and tear-resistant, bearing up to 500 pounds. Ultra-thick material makes it anti-scratch, wearproof on the snow.

★★Much Larger Size★★: A-DUDU snow tube is designed with larger size - 47 inches, big enough for both children and adults. Streamlined circle design without any protrusions to protect children's safety. It allows everyone of your families to enjoy the fun of snow tubing. Best Christmas gift for family and friends!

★★Fast Inflation&Deflation Valve★★: Our snow tube couldn't be easier to inflate! With the 3 in 1 inflatable valve, just use an air pump to inflate and it will be ready to use in seconds. Large valve for quick inflation and deflation; Double locking valve guarantees the air seal tightly.

★★Strengthened Safety Handles★★: [UPGRADE]Sturdy handles make you safely in place when tubing. We improve the grab handles of our snow tube, double reinforced the grab handles, making it more durable, more sturdy, avoiding the problem of easily torn by strong pulling force. Our product is designed with the highest level of integrity as we take safety and compliance seriously, all of our inflatables are safety-tested!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
